Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: MrJ
Reviews.Content: I bought the starter set from target, one 8'' monitor and 2 indoor/outdoor cameras and over all they are great not the best of the best but i'd give them a 7 out of 10 for over all performance. I ordered this one because target no longer carries the set and this one came down in price.Mounting was easy and even though the camera mount is cheap it holds the camera all the same. The pairing is very simple and for me during the day i get an easy 75 to 100' motion activation per camera and 25 to 30' at night. Night is grainy but works and daylight hours are very detailed.. I see clearly 200 feet and as far as 3 blocks without motion activation of course. Monitor hooks up to TV and splits four ways on screen or rotates between frames. YOU can NOT use it like an IP cam according to the manual unless you sign up for a skype account which i think is cheesy yet over all its affordable and mine records up to 8 gig sd card about 3 days on motion activation on busy street...I will order the last one soon for a full set..

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Rose Holly
Reviews.Content: We have wanted a security system for a while. We live in the country so this makes it so easy..Only thing we can't use it inside our Quonset. Not sure if it is to far from the receiver or what so we mounted on our house and aimed at Quonset. They are great at night too..Love it.

Reviews.Title: A Nice Camera.
Reviews.Author: Dan Hundley
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to install and program. The only thing I don't like is when a person or vehicle travels across the screen the motion is not smooth.

Reviews.Title: Does everything well
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A must for upgrading your system to full functionality.  Works well, system recognition is a snap.  Good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great little cameras
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Bought to add on to my 2 camera system.  I only wish they had a pan feature on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Uniden UDRC 14 Camera
Reviews.Author: Chuck C.
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the quality of the picture. Very easy to set up and pair with the monitor.

Reviews.Title: Does what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: TonyS "E. tech"
Reviews.Content: The motion detection is not for long range but at around 15 feet from each door it records and detects reliably even with the night vision "ON" (LEDS). As far as clarity it is just fine for the 480 lines I get. I can make out most everything. I have had these for 3 months on continuously with no issues. AND the intercom feature features a good speaker as well as a mic. It was easy to Pair with my Uniden UDR444. Daylight gives you even more motion detection range depending on the setting you have in your Uniden Unit. Low, Medium or High.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Leon Kruhalski
Reviews.Content: It's just what I wanted and needed, it works great. Just ordered another unit to lock in the back yard area. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good consumer grade home system
Reviews.Author: yocarlos
Reviews.Content: Short term durability good so far.  Transmission range seriously limited by buildings, particularly metal, but camera works well for the price.  It is definitely consumer grade, as they say.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: C. Halterman
Reviews.Content: Easily paired with my existing system by pressing a button on the monitor and pressing the button on the camera. How easy is that? It works better than expected.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: I ordered the two additional cameras to go with my original purchase. They linked up just fine with themonitor and are working great in my barn.  My order was shipped and I rec'd. it in 3 days.  I am perfectly happy with the service,product and the price. (They were a lot cheaper than what Walmart would sell them for).

Reviews.Title: Security cameras
Reviews.Author: Debanne
Reviews.Content: We had the existing security system but with only two cameras.  We added two more cameras and now feel more secure.  All angles of our property and house are now covered.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with the Uniden UDR video surveillance series
Portable cameras transmit up to 500 feet away
Weatherproof rating for outdoor use
ProductInfo.Name: Uniden UDRC14 Indoor/Outdoor Camera Accessory for UDR444 (UDRC14)
